channel.title: !HELP! how to make a NPC Tradeable !HELP!
channel.description:
(Tradeable, yes, i mean you can trade with the NPC) Server Based: PimpScape
if u use the Npcspawnpoint, i make a npc (simple) But how do u do it, that you can trade with that NPC??
Can someone help me with this? (If there's a TuT please, give the link here).
If you can help, very ty!

item.title: !HELP! how to make a NPC Tradeable !HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Well, how about making a shop with the NPC ID?!
